text: Down Periscope is a 1996 comedy movie directed by David S. Ward and starring Kelsey Grammer, Lauren Holly, Rob Schneider, Harry Dean Stanton, Rip Torn, Bruce Dern, William H. Macy, Toby Huss, Duane Martin and Bradford Tatum. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * * * * Category:1996 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies about the United States Navy Category:Movies directed by David S. Ward
title: Down Periscope
